net.kuujo.vertigo.hook

Class MetricsHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.hook.MetricsHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentHook, Hook, InputHook, IOHook, OutputHook, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serialization.JsonSerializable

    public class MetricsHook
extends Object
implements ComponentHook
    This hook integrates directly with the mod-metrics module by Tim Yates. To add the hook to a component, simply instantiate the hook with the event bus address of the mod-metrics module.

     network.addVerticle("foo", Foo.class.getName()).addHook(new MetricsHook("com.bloidonia.metrics"));
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
